name: univ

body.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(universe), universe)
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(universe)), cuni(universe))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(universe)), universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(universe), universe)
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(universe)), cuni(universe))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(universe)), universe)

|- wceq(cuni(universe), universe)
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(universe)), universe)
-| wceq(cpw(universe), universe)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ⋃ 𝕌 = 𝕌
⊣ ⋃ P(𝕌)= 𝕌
⊣ P(𝕌)= 𝕌

comment: The union of the universe is the universe. Exercise 4.12(c) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)
